Project-Name: Real Time ISS Tracker with Astronaut On Board
Description: Developed a real- time International Space Station tracker in Python, integrating two API for location (OpenNotify API) and astronaut data.

Key Features.Feature 1: Displayed ISS location dynamically on a world map using graphical modules.
Key Features.Feature 2: Enhanced the tracker with live updates on astronauts currently aboard the ISS, including their names.
